whitebridge.name: whitebridge
whitebridge.description: A city around the only bridge spanning the Arinelle south of Maradon in Saldaea.

borderlands.name: Borderlands
borderlands.description: The borderlands are named because they share a border against the Great Blight. Trollocs and Myrdrall (Fades) are a regular occurance in these lands, forcing the borderlanders to be a hard warrior people where all people no matter their occupation must be familar with and capable of using weapons to defend themselves, others, and their animals.  In the borderlands it is illegal to hide your face in a town as a defense against fades, and the towns all have lamps lit during the night.

arafel.name: Arafel
arafel.description: One of the borderlands between Shienar to the east and Kandor to the west. Arafel has kings but the queen rules while the king is on campaign. Both the men and women wear their hair in two braids. One braid over each ear which usually fall below the shoulder. Arafellin were generally considered 'touchy' and the men regularly fight duels. The choice of weapon goes to the one challenged. They are known to be creative with the choice such as fighting in a dark room. The women fight duels as well, though rarely, and deny they have done so if they did. Women don't use swords but have been known to use knives, whips, and lances. The primary exports are timber and furs. They also have several gem stone mines that produce firedrops and other gems, as well as gold and silver mines. Like all borderlands it is illegal to hide your face in a town as a defense against fades, and the towns all have lamps lit during the night.

shienar.name: Shienar
shienar.description: One of the borderland nations with the Spine of the World to the East, Arafel to the West, and the Blight and Tarwins Gap to the North. Men shave portions of their head and fashion their hair into top knots, similar to the Japanese Samurai. Women were held in high regard and enjoyed saftey anywhere they went, in Sheinar a woman's rights were whatever she said they were. Sheinar had large public bathes of tiled pools were all people bathed together. Sheinar had a good number of gold mines, and was the largest source of firedrops. Timber and furs also were major exports.

chachin.name: Chachin

things.The Strike at Shayol Ghul: Fragment of a manuscript reavealing significant aspects on the War of the Shadow.

chachin.description: Located at a cross roads for the Borderlands for roads leading to Tar Valon, Bandar Evan and Fal Moran. Comparable in size to Tear. Noteably the main events of A New Spring and where Lan was bonded to Moiraine.

emond's field.name: emond's field
emond's field.description: Small farming village in the Two Rivers. Home town of the main characters.

watch hill.name: watch hill
watch hill.description: Small farming village in the Two Rivers close to Emond's Field.

shadar logoth.name: shadar logoth

things.Mashadar: The evil born from Aridhol that lives deep in the bed rock of the city.

shadar logoth.description: Formerly known as Aridhol, Shadar Logoth (The place where the shadow waits or shadow's waiting).

the stag and lion.name: The Stag and Lion
the stag and lion.description: Inn where Min grew up and the Emond's Field crew stayed on their way out of the Two Rivers.

arutur hawkwing's steading.name: arutur hawkwing's steading
arutur hawkwing's steading.description: A steading at least a day outside of Caemlyn where Perrin and Egwene first encountered Lord Bornhald and Child Byar.

Arien.name: Arien
Arien.description: First town after the Grinwell's farm on the road to Caemlyn where Rand and Mat first tried out their Gleeman skills.

rand al'thor.name: rand al'thor
rand al'thor.description: Tall with Red Hair. Likes Red Coats and sword fights.

easar togita.name: Easar Togita
easar togita.description: King of Shienar. Stood about 5ft 7in tall with an unwrinkled slim square face. In the style of Sheinaran men he shaved his head except for a white top knot. Hosted the party from the Eye of the World at his manor. Provided aid to the WoT's heros on several occasions. Notably he backhanded Rand to test if he really was the Dragon, and writes poetry. In Japanese 'Togita' translates to 'Sharpened'.

paitar nachiman.name: Paitar Nachiman
paitar nachiman.description: Paitar Neramovni Nachiman, King of Arafel. name comes from the Japanese god of archery and war Hachiman.

ethenielle materasu.name: Ethenielle Materasu
ethenielle materasu.description: Queen of Kandor. Shield of the North. Highseat of House Materasu. 5ft 4in tall and buxom with blue eyes and black hair with whisps of gray. Married Brys Noramaga who was murdered by Merean Redhill of the Black Ajah along with their son. Fought in the Last Battle with Lan's army. Her family likely derives from the Japanese Sun Goddess 'Amaterasu', which translates to English as 'Heaven's Shining Light'.

moiraine damodred.name: moiraine damodred
moiraine damodred.role: Aes Sedai of the Blue Ajah and Advisor to the Dragon Reborn

avin.name: avin
avin.description: Gate guard for Baerlon that Moiraine and Lan used to pass in and out of the town discretely.

master fitch.name: master fitch
master fitch.role: Inn Keeper of The Stag and Lion
master fitch.description: Inn keeper of The Stag and Lion in Baerlon. Round man that wears a white apron and has wispy hair sticking out in all directions.

ara.name: ara
ara.description: Tall young man, a bit lanky with dark hair. Speaks with an accent local to Baerlon like he has mush in his mouth.

min.name: min
min.role: Scholar of the Careathon cycle, Tavern Maid, and Lover of Rand al'Thor
min.description: Girl with large dark eyes and cropped hair. She wears a boy's coat and britches in contrast to the majority of women that wear dresses and skirts. Min often visits libraries and reads a lot. She's a few years older than Rand al'Thor.

geofram bornhald.name: geofram bornhald
geofram bornhald.role: Captain of the Children of the Light
geofram bornhald.description: Wears an unblinking and arrogant look, as well as a breastplate and conical steel cap that shines like silver. A long pristine white cloak embroidered on the left breast with a golden sunburst. Dark-eyed, grand-fatherly face at odds  with the white-and-gold tabard and burnshed armor over a pure-white under-coat. Kindly face, bluff and dignified. He keeps simple spartan furnishings that are of high craftsmanship.

padan fain.name: padan fain
padan fain.description: Often dressed in rags and has a half starved and crazed look. Destroyed and rebuilt as the dark one's hound doomed to hunt out Rand al'Thor and never rest.

nyanaeve al'mera.name: nyanaeve al'mera
nyanaeve al'mera.description: Short, pretty, with dark hair and eyes. Stout shoes and dresses made of good two rivers wool. Wears her hair in a thick braid down to her waist.

mavra mallen.name: mavra mallen
mavra mallen.description: Wisdom in the Two Rivers. Substituted for Nyanaeve when she chased after the other four.

bayle domon.name: bayle domon

things.seal to the dark one's prison: a round disk made of cuendillar. One part black the other white divided by a senious line.

bayle domon.description: Stalky man with long hair to his thick shoulders and a beard that leaves his upper lip bare frames a round face. Round but not soft.

floran gelb.name: floran gelb
floran gelb.description: Narrow faced crewman on Captain Domon's river boat. He was asleep on watch when Rand, Mat, and Thom came over the side. Rand kicked him in the head on accident.

elyas machera.name: elyas machera
elyas machera.description: Greying brown hair and yellow wolf's eyes. Wears clothes made from animal skins and a flot-topped round fur hat.

raen.name: raen
raen.description: Wirey gray-haired short man. Wearing a high collared red coat and baggy bright green trousers tucked into knee boots.

hopper.name: hopper
hopper.role: wolf and best friend to Perrin
hopper.description: Large wolf with scars from hunting and fightings. Loves to jump, and flies in the wolf dream. Killed by Geofram Bornhald

burn.name: burn
burn.description: Angry wolf with a large burn on his right shoulder. Hates Trollocs with his whole being.

dapple.name: dapple
dapple.description: Lead wolf of Elyas and Hopper's wolf pack.

wind.name: wind
wind.description: Wolf in Elyas and Hopper's wolf pack.

bartin.name: bartin
bartin.description: Innkeepr of Wayfarer's rest in whitebridge. Thinning hair and sore feet.

owyn.name: owyn
owyn.role: Thom Merrilin's nephew. Murdered by the Red Adjah
owyn.description: Thom Merrilin's nephew that started to channel. He was murdered by the Red Adjah. Which motivated Thom to help Rand, Mat, and Perrin.

aram.name: aram
aram.description: Slender young man with more than his share of good looks, wearing green stripes.

ila.name: ila
ila.description: Raen's wife. Smooth cheeked plump woman with gray hair.

jaret byar.name: jaret byar
jaret byar.description: Tall with a long and gaunt face and eyes so deeply set they seemed to look out from caves. No excess flesh on him, none at all. His skin was pulled tight over the muscle and bone beneath. Over Zealous member of the children of the light. A core villian of Perrin's story.

else grinwell.name: else grinwell
else grinwell.role: Farm Girl with hots for Rand
else grinwell.description: Dark hiared, big eyed, and very pretty

eazil fortney.name: eazil fortney
eazil fortney.description: Farmer gave rand and mat a riide out of Arien in his cart after their first night of gleemanship.

howal gode.name: howal gode
howal gode.description: Rich dark friend in The Dancing Cartman. Rand saw his coach in Whitebridge as well. Possibly a male channeler? He said - I know what you are, perhaps better than you do. I can feel it coming off you in waves.
